metadata.title: CVE-2024-55566 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ColPack 1.0.10 through 9a7293a has a predictable temporary file (locatedunder /tmp with a name derived from an unseeded RNG). The impact can beoverwriting files or making ColPack graphing unavailable to other users.

criterions.comment: colpack package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
